name: Paytm Digital Downloads
author: Paytm

sections.description: A paytm gateway for Easy Digital Downloads. This plugin allow you to accept payments using Paytm. This plugin will add a Paytm Payment option on checkout page, when user choses Paytm as Payment Method, he will redirected to Paytm website to complete his transaction and on completion his payment, paytm will send that user back to your website along with transactions details. This plugin uses server-to-server verification to add additional security layer for validating transactions. Admin can also see payment status for orders by navigating to Downloads > Payment History from menu in admin.
sections.installation:
• Download “Paytm Digital Downloads” plugin and Unzip it
  • Copy the “edd-paytm-gateway” folder into your installation’s “wp-content/plugin” folder
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress Administration.
  • Visit the Downloads > Settings > Payment Gateways tab. page to configure Paytm Payment Gateway Plugin.
  • Your Paytm Payment Gateway plugin is now setup. You can now accept payments through Paytm.
